items.sentence: When Tom was a child, his family was very poor.
When was the last time that you were this busy?
I told Tom that I wasn\'t very good at cooking.
Tom can\'t be expected to do that without help.
Tom is your daughter\'s best friend, isn\'t he?
I don\'t know how to say "thank you" in French.
I don\'t know what to buy him for his birthday.
I don\'t know what to do about his shoplifting.
I don\'t know whether I need to do that or not.
Tom\'s friends knew Tom couldn\'t speak French.
